"Sneezin' Sensations": A virtual reality experience where users don a VR headset and become the Sneezy Dragon, complete with a sneeze-inducing sensory overload.
"Sniffles and Sparkles": A line of artisanal candles infused with the essence of dragon snot, complete with a "sneeze-inducing" scent that's sure to delight.
"Dragon Dust": A brand of allergy-fighting supplements that harnesses the power of the Sneezy Dragon's sneezes to help alleviate symptoms.
"Sneezy's Snookems": A line of handcrafted snooker balls made from the finest dragon scales, each one bearing the unique sneeze pattern of the Sneezy Dragon.

"Sneezy's Soothin' Sneezes": A subscription-based service where users can receive a monthly delivery of sneezes recorded by the Sneezy Dragon, complete with a calming aromatherapy blend to help relax and unwind.
